channel.title: How can I make a command to stop a person from teleporting?
channel.description:
I attempted to make one and it didn't work.
I made it where the command triggered this:
[code] public void teleblock() { // stops from teleing anywhere AntiTeleDelay = 1000;[/code]
Anyways, I think I didn't do it right
Can someone point me in the right direction and help me make a command to stop the person from using teleport for 1 minute.
Thanks

take the command he gave you and remove all the stuff you dont want like teleportTo
and just keep
c.teleblock = true;

item.title: How can I make a command to stop a person from teleporting?
item.dc:creator: @mrx229 mrx229
item.description:
@mrx229 wrote:

well heres a ::jail Command Wich teleblocks them… chnage it to the waya u want, like you wont need the +jal
if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 2) {
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 2451;
c.teleportToY = 4938;
c.teleblock = true;
c.jal += 1;
c.teleBlockTimer = 99999999;
c.teleblock = true;
c.teletimer = 99999999;
c.sendMessage(“You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!”);
c.sendMessage(“A mod or Admin will release you if they feel like it!”);
c.teleblock = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Read full topic
